titles.title: A bill to renew the temporary suspension of duty on 2-(2'-hydroxy-5'-methacrylyloxyethylphenyl)-2 Hbenzotriazole.
A bill to renew the temporary suspension of duty on 2-(2'-hydroxy-5'-methacrylyloxyethylphenyl)-2 Hbenzotriazole.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on 2-(2-hydroxy-5- methacrylyloxyethylphenyl)-2 Hbenzotriazole.
